titles.title: Honoring the life and accomplishments of Henry Thomas Segerstrom and expressing condolences on his passing.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 4/21/2015--Introduced. Honors the life and accomplishments of Henry Thomas Segerstrom, and extends heartfelt sympathies and condolences to his family.
